title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.80 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.80 - Definition

State Regulations

Wetlands shall mean those areas which are inundated by
surface or ground water with a frequency sufficient to support a prevalence of
vegetative or aquatic life that requires saturated soil conditions for growth
and reproduction, or are delineated as wetlands by a signatory
state. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.80

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
